column5: Last year I bought one of these and raved about it,s performance.I never had an issue with it (yet),but seems someone may have. They are being recalled. When useing the saw side,the saw could jam,then your hand could slip off the handle and onto the blade. They have redesigned the handle.  I,ll be calling in for my new one,when I get home.
They're not replacing them Brian. They're just giving out a free mithril glove to everyone who has purchased the machete.
Where did they find the dwarfs to make the mithril gloves Roy?  Dan
